news.title: Nigel Farage urges PM to appoint Reform peers to House of Lords
news.summary: Reform has four MPs in the House of Commons and controls ten councils in England, but currently has no peers.

news.title: He found a bomb under a playground - and there were 176 more
news.summary: The playground now offering children an explosion of fun without the threat of an actual explosion.

news.title: Australian who killed UK woman eligible for earlier release after appeal
news.summary: The man stabbed Emma Lovell to death on Boxing Day in 2022, after breaking into her Brisbane home.

news.title: The Papers: Putin 'ready to make deal' and VJ Day 80 years on
news.summary: The Alaska summit between the US and Russian presidents Trump and Putin leads Friday's papers.

news.title: Instagram users angry and confused as Meta overturns yet more account bans
news.summary: Hundreds of people have contacted the BBC to say they have wrongly been shut out of their accounts.

news.title: Why Liverpool's spending spree has piled pressure and scrutiny on Slot
news.summary: Liverpool's spending spree has put head coach Arne Slot under increased pressure to repeat title success, says BBC Sport chief football writer Phil McNulty.

news.title: Difficult for Isak to stay at Newcastle - Rooney
news.summary: Wayne Rooney was involved in transfer sagas in his playing career and says in his new podcast it will be hard for Alexander Isak to stay at Newcastle.

news.title: 'Special goal' - Hibs striker Bowie delivers moment of magic
news.summary: Kieron Bowie scores "a special goal at a special time" as Hibernian come through a "massive test of character" to beat Partizan Belgrade in Conference League qualifying.
